Container.Name: streetmerchant
Container.Overview:
This service is a automated stock checker primarily focused on CPUs, GPUs, and Console Gaming Systems that has an abundance of mechanisms to notify your user group when items are available to include a link to add to an online cart.
To test notifications two methods exist: 1) Add "test:notification:production" (no quotes) to the extra parameters. The system will exit after one notification has been sent. 2) Set the following SHOW_ONLY_SERIES variable to "test:series".

Config.Name: Web Interface Port
Config.Description: This is Web UI port you can access via a web browser.

Config.Name: PROXY_PROTOCOL
Config.Description: http or socks5

Config.Name: PROXY_ADDRESS
Config.Description: The IP address or domain name of your proxy

Config.Name: PROXY_PORT
Config.Description: TCP Port number on which the proxy is listening for connections

Config.Name: EMAIL_TO
Config.Description: Destination Email. Defaults to username if not set. Can be comma separated

Config.Name: EMAIL_USERNAME
Config.Description: Email address

Config.Name: EMAIL_PASSWORD
Config.Description:
Email password. (See below for Gmail MFA users)
If you use Gmail and have multi-factor authentication (MFA), you will need to create an app password and use this instead of your Gmail password.
https://myaccount.google.com/apppasswords

Config.Name: TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_KEY
Config.Description: Container Variable: TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_KEY

Config.Name: TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET
Config.Description: Twitter Token Secret

Config.Name: TWITTER_CONSUMER_KEY
Config.Description: Twitter Consumer Key

Config.Name: TWITTER_CONSUMER_SECRET
Config.Description: Twitter Consumer Secret

Config.Name: TWITTER_TWEET_TAGS
Config.Description: List of hashtags to append to the tweet message, e.g.: #nvidia #nvidiastock

Config.Name: TELEGRAM_ACCESS_TOKEN
Config.Description: Access token

Config.Name: TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID
Config.Description: Chat ID. Can be comma separated, e.g.: 123456789,987654321

Config.Name: PUSHBULLET
Config.Description: API key

Config.Name: IN_STOCK_WAIT_TIME
Config.Description: Time to wait between requests to the same link if it has that card in stock. In seconds

Config.Name: SCREENSHOT
Config.Description: Capture screenshot of page if the product is in stock.

Config.Name: PHONE_CARRIER
Config.Description:
Supported carriers for SMS. E.g.: att or att,verizon,google, email configuration required. If multiple phone numbers are listed, enter a carrier for each phone number.
https://jef.codes/streetmerchant/reference/notification/#supported-carriers

Config.Name: PHONE_NUMBER
Config.Description: 10 digit phone number(s). E.g.: 1234567890 or 1234567890,0987654321,11112223333, email configuration required.

Config.Name: SHOW_ONLY_BRANDS
Config.Description:
Filter to show specified brands. Comma separated, e.g.: evga,zotac
https://jef.codes/streetmerchant/reference/filter/

Config.Name: SHOW_ONLY_SERIES
Config.Description:
Filter to show specified series. Comma separated, e.g.: 3080,ryzen5900
https://jef.codes/streetmerchant/reference/filter/

Config.Name: SHOW_ONLY_MODELS
Config.Description: Filter to show specified models Both supported formats are comma separated

Config.Name: STORES
Config.Description:
Supported stores you want to be scraped. Default: amazon,bestbuy. Comma separated, can include PAGE_SLEEP_MIN and PAGE_SLEEP_MAX values. E.g.: amazon:10000:30000,bestbuy,newegg:50000:80000.
https://jef.codes/streetmerchant/reference/filter/#supported-stores

Config.Name: AUTO_ADD_TO_CART
Config.Description:
Future Feature. Not available yet.
Enable auto add to cart on support stores, default: true

Config.Name: BROWSER_TRUSTED
Config.Description: Skip Chromium Sandbox. Set to true for containerized environments,

Config.Name: HEADLESS
Config.Description: Puppeteer to run headless or not. Debugging related, default: true

Config.Name: INCOGNITO
Config.Description: Puppeteer to run incognito or not. Debugging related, default: false

Config.Name: LOW_BANDWIDTH
Config.Description: Blocks images/fonts to reduce traffic. Disables ad blocker, default: false

Config.Name: PAGE_BACKOFF_MIN
Config.Description: Minimum backoff time between retrying requests for the same store when a forbidden response is received (ms)

Config.Name: PAGE_BACKOFF_MAX
Config.Description: Maximum backoff time between retrying requests for the same store when a forbidden response is received. (ms)

Config.Name: PAGE_SLEEP_MIN
Config.Description: Minimum sleep time between queries of the same product page. In milliseconds,

Config.Name: PAGE_SLEEP_MAX
Config.Description: Maximum sleep time between queries of the same product page. In milliseconds,

Config.Name: PAGE_TIMEOUT
Config.Description: Navigation Timeout in milliseconds. 0 for infinite, default: 30000

Config.Name: WEB_PORT
Config.Description:
This must be synchronized with the Web Interface Port values.
This is the internal port the container should serve the web interface on.

Config.Name: COUNTRY
Config.Description:
Supported country you want to be scraped Only used with nvidia-api, default: usa
https://jef.codes/streetmerchant/reference/filter/#supported-countries

Config.Name: Log Path
Config.Description: This is where log files will be written if an error occurs.

Config.Name: SMTP_PORT
Config.Description: TCP Port number on which the smtp server is listening for connections.

Config.Name: SMTP_ADDRESS
Config.Description: IP Address or FQDN of SMTP server

Config.Name: Console Verbosity
Config.Description:
The console output verbosity.
Note: This is not logged to the system logger.

Config.Name: BESTBUY_API_KEY
Config.Description: Set an optional API key for faster Bestbuy checking via JSON

Container.Description:
This service is a automated stock checker primarily focused on CPUs, GPUs, and Console Gaming Systems that has an abundance of mechanisms to notify your user group when items are available to include a link to add to an online cart.
To test notifications two methods exist: 1) Add "test:notification:production" (no quotes) to the extra parameters. The system will exit after one notification has been sent. 2) Set the following SHOW_ONLY_SERIES variable to "test:series".
